scripts.my_work_telcount_build: set NODE_ENV=production&& set BIZ_NAME=myWorkTelCount && webpack --config src/my/work/telcount/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/work/telcount/server/build.js
scripts.my_work_telcount_build_mac: export NODE_ENV=production && export BIZ_NAME=myWorkTelCount && webpack --config src/my/work/telcount/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/work/telcount/server/build.js
scripts.my_work_channel_build: set NODE_ENV=production&& set BIZ_NAME=myWorkChannel && webpack --config src/my/work/channel/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/work/channel/server/build.js
scripts.my_work_channel_build_mac: export NODE_ENV=production && export BIZ_NAME=myWorkChannel && webpack --config src/my/channel/work/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/work/channel/server/build.js
scripts.my_work_sale_build: set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --config src/my/work/sale/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/work/sale/server/build.js
scripts.oms_build: set NODE_ENV=production&& set DOMAIN=oms&&  webpack --config src/oms/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules -d && node ./src/oms/server/build.js
scripts.oms_build_mac: export NODE_ENV=production&& export DOMAIN=oms&& webpack --config src/oms/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules  && node ./src/oms/server/build.js
scripts.biz_tag_build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BIZ_NAME=biz webpack --config src/biz/web/crm/tag/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/biz/web/crm/tag/server/build.js
scripts.biz_sale_dev: set NODE_ENV=dev && set BIZ_NAME=biz && node src/biz/web/crm/sale/server/server.js
scripts.biz_sale_dev_mac: export NODE_ENV=dev&& export BIZ_NAME=biz&& node src/biz/web/crm/sale/server/server.js
scripts.biz_sale_build: set NODE_ENV=production && set BIZ_NAME=biz && webpack --config src/biz/web/crm/sale/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/biz/web/crm/sale/server/build.js
scripts.biz_sale_build_mac: export NODE_ENV=production && export BIZ_NAME=biz && webpack --config src/biz/web/crm/sale/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/biz/web/crm/sale/server/build.js
scripts.my_ecapp_build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BIZ_NAME=myECApp webpack --config src/my/ecapp/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/my/ecapp/server/build.js
scripts.ecform_pc_build: set NODE_ENV=production&& set BIZ_NAME=ECFormPC && webpack --config src/ecform/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules
scripts.ecform_pc_build_mac: export NODE_ENV=production&& export BIZ_NAME=ECFormPC && webpack --config src/ecform/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules
scripts.biz_comm_build: node ./build/index.js --config ./src/biz/web/crm/tag/webpack.config.js && node ./build/index.js --config ./src/biz/web/crm/rule/webpack.config.js && set NODE_ENV=production && set BIZ_NAME=biz && webpack --config src/biz/web/crm/sale/webpack.config.js --progress --color --display-modules && node src/biz/web/crm/sale/server/build.js
